name: AdditionGame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: addition game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you like challenges!?
Let's have a challenge in Mathematics.
Addition Game challenges your math skills in adding two numbers. You'll be given two numbers to add. Then, you shall respond with the result of adding them. Practice your addition skill with Alexa. It is not necessary but if you play this game on an Echo Show 10 device (3rd Gen), you get cool motion responses.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
